about_the_game:
Three short interactive stories about women exploring their sexuality and becoming intimate with ravenous and gentle monsters. Welcome to a world of sensuality, freedom, and love!

THE HOT STUFF

- A unique, hand-drawn art style adapted from the popular comic by the author herself: Ana Pepper!
- Flirt, connect and maximize pleasure as you control the human and monster lovers
- Around one hour of gameplay, with repeatable sex minigames and several achievements to unlock along the way
- Become a specialist in sex, love and monstrosity!
